summary.blockquote: NOTENote: Instead of using the deprecated ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.oninstall handler to catch events of this type, handle the (non-deprecated) event using a listener added with .

remarks.para: The parameter passed into the handler, the InstallEvent interface represents an install action that is dispatched on the of a . As a child of , it ensures that functional events such as are not dispatched during installation.
This interface inherits from the interface.
